short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the Condor Server List and allows multiplayer sessions to launch via Revive with the Condor2 Revive Helper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Condor2 Extension greatly simplifies the process of finding a server by colour-coding columns, and adds buttons which allow VR users to seamlessly launch multiplayer sessions using Revive when the Condor2 Revive Helper is installed.
